description: Mike Matheny responded to an investigation by the F.B.I. and federal prosecutors into whether the St. Louis baseball team hacked into the computers of the Houston Astros.
title: St. Louis Cardinals Manager’s Reaction
title_page: St. Louis Cardinals Manager’s Reaction - Video - NYTimes.com
text: Mike Matheny responded to an investigation by the F.B.I. and federal prosecutors into whether the St. Louis baseball team hacked into the computers of the Houston Astros.
